export function A(p: { initialData: SomeType }) {

      clearInterval(intervalId);
    };

}

            message: 'T·∫°o ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng th·∫•t b·∫°i',        
        };

    // Sau khi th√†nh c√¥ng, l√†m m·ªõi b·ªô nh·ªõ cache v√† chuy·ªÉn h∆∞·ªõng

import { z } from 'zod';   
import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';   
import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';   
import { createUser } from '@/app/actions/user';   
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';      

const FormSchema = z.object({    
    name: z    
        .string()    
        .min(3, { message: 'Qu√° ng·∫Øn' })    
        .refine(value => value !== 'f*ck', { message: 'Kh√¥ng d√πng t·ª´ x·∫•u' }),    
    age: z.number(),   
});      

export default function App() {    
    const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({    
        // T·∫£i s∆° ƒë·ªì ·ªü ƒë√¢y    
        resolver: zodResolver(FormSchema),    
        // N·∫øu ƒë√£ thi·∫øt l·∫≠p defaultValues, gi√° tr·ªã s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c ti√™m v√†o c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ bi·ªÉu m·∫´u t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng, th∆∞·ªùng d√πng cho thao t√°c c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t    
        // defaultValues: {    
        //     name: 'xfz',    
        //     age: 20,    
        // },    
    });       

    const submit = async (formData: typeof FormSchema._type) {    
        const router = useRouter();       

        try {    
            const { success, message } = await createUser(formData);    
            if (success) {    
                alert('Th√†nh c√¥ng');    
                router.push('/userlist');    
                router.refresh();    
            } else {    
                alert('T·∫°o kh√¥ng th√†nh c√¥ng: ' + message);    
            }    
        } catch (error) {    
            console.error(error?.message ?? error);    
        }    
    };       

    // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng register thay th·∫ø cho t√™n c·ªßa c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ bi·ªÉu m·∫´u, v√† bao b·ªçc actionFn b·∫±ng handleSubmit ƒë·ªÉ g·ª≠i    
    return (    
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(submit)}>    
            <input {...register('name')} />    
            <span>{errors.name.message}</span>    
            <input type="number" {...register('age')} />    
            <span>{errors.age.message}</span>    
            <button type="submit">G·ª≠i</button>    
        </form>    
    );   
};

export default function middleware(req: NextRequest) {

CORS

import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';

const allowedOrigins = ['https://acme.com', 'https://my-app.org'];

const corsOptions = {
    'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS',
    'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type, Authorization',
};

export function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
    // Ki·ªÉm tra ngu·ªìn g·ªëc t·ª´ y√™u c·∫ßu
    const origin = request.headers.get('origin') ?? '';
    const isAllowedOrigin = allowedOrigins.includes(origin);
    
    // X·ª≠ l√Ω c√°c y√™u c·∫ßu ti·ªÅn ki·ªÉm
    const isPreflight = request.method === 'OPTIONS';
    
    if (isPreflight) {
        const preflightHeaders = {
            ...(isAllowedOrigin && { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': origin }),
            ...corsOptions,
        };
        return NextResponse.json({}, { headers: preflightHeaders });
    }
    
    // X·ª≠ l√Ω c√°c y√™u c·∫ßu ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n
    const response = NextResponse.next();
    
    if (isAllowedOrigin) {
        response.headers.set('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', origin);
    }
    
    Object.entries(corsOptions).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        response.headers.set(key, value);
    });
    
    return response;
}

    matcher: '/api/:path*',

// /middlewares/authMiddleware.ts
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import type { NextFetchEvent } from 'next/server';

export default function auth(req: NextRequest, ev: NextFetchEvent) {
    console.log('------- auth ------');
    const userId = req.cookies.get('userId');
    if (!userId) {
        return NextResponse.redirect(new URL('/login', req.url));
    }
    return NextResponse.next();
}

// /middlewares/loggerMiddleware.ts
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import type { NextFetchEvent } from 'next/server';

// M√¥ ph·ªèng API
const analyze = (data: { pathname: string; searchParams: Record<string, string> }) =>
    new Promise<void>((resolve) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            console.log('---- Record log ----');
            resolve();
        }, 2000);
    });

export default function loggerMiddleware(req: NextRequest, event: NextFetchEvent) {
    const {
        nextUrl: { pathname, searchParams },
    } = req;
    event.waitUntil(
        analyze({
            pathname,
            searchParams: Object.fromEntries(searchParams),
        })
    );
    return NextResponse.next();
}

// Logic x·ª≠ l√Ω middleware

„Äå3. ·ª¶y quy·ªÅn (middleware)„Äç

// middleware.ts
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';

export default function middleware(req: NextRequest) {
    const { pathname } = new URL(req.url);
    if (pathname.startsWith('/create')) {
        const session = req.cookies.get('session')?.value;
        if (!session) {
            return NextResponse.redirect(new URL('/login', req.url));
        }
    }
    return NextResponse.next();
}

    matcher: ['/create/:path*'],

'use server';

import { AuthError } from 'next-auth';
import { signIn } from '@/auth';

export async function authenticate(
    prevState: string | undefined,
    formData: FormData,
) {
    try {
        // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c ƒëƒÉng nh·∫≠p "email/password"
        await signIn('credentials', {
            ...formData,
            redirect: true,
            callbackUrl: '/',
        });
    } catch (error) {
        if (error instanceof AuthError) {
            switch (error.type) {
                case 'CredentialsSignin':
                    return 'Invalid credentials.';
                default:
                    return 'Something went wrong.';
            }
        }
        throw error;
    }
}

                    // N·∫øu ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng kh√¥ng t·ªìn t·∫°i, x√°c th·ª±c th·∫•t b·∫°i

import { LOCALES, DEFAULT_LOCALE } from './i18n';

// Middleware qu·ªëc t·∫ø h√≥a
const intlMiddleware = createMiddleware({
  locales: LOCALES,
  defaultLocale: DEFAULT_LOCALE,
});

// C√°c trang kh√¥ng c·∫ßn ki·ªÉm tra x√°c th·ª±c
const publicPages = ['/', '/sign-in', '/sign-up'];

const publicPathnameRegex = RegExp(
  `^(/(${LOCALES.join('|')}))?(${publicPages
    .flatMap((p) => (p === '/' ? ['','/'] : p))
    .join('|')})/?$`,
  'i'
);

export default function middleware(req: NextRequest) {
  const isPublicPage = publicPathnameRegex.test(req.nextUrl.pathname);
  
  if (isPublicPage) {
    return intlMiddleware(req);
  } else {
    return // Ki·ªÉm tra x√°c th·ª±c
  }
}

export const config = {
  matcher: ['/((?!.+\\.[\\w]+$|_next).*)', '/', '/(api|trpc)(.*)'],

'use client';
import { useLocale } from 'next-intl';
import { usePathname, useRouter } from 'next/navigation';

export function ToggleLocale() {
  const locale = useLocale();
  const router = useRouter();
  const pathname = usePathname();

  const toggleLanguage = (item: string) =>
    locale !== item && router.replace(`${item}${pathname.split('/' + locale)[1]}`);

  return (
    <ul>
      {['en', 'cn'].map(item => (
        <li
          className={`${locale === item ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => toggleLanguage(item)}
        >
          {item}
        </li>
      ))}
    </ul>
  );
}

// D·ªØ li·ªáu meta c·ªßa quy tr√¨nh, cho ph√©p th√™m c√°c thu·ªôc t√≠nh meta t√πy ch·ªçn cho t·ª´ng quy tr√¨nh, s·∫Ω c√≥ s·∫µn trong t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c tham s·ªë c·ªßa h√†m middleware

    role?: 'tourist' | 'user' | 'admin'; // Ph√¢n lo·∫°i vai tr√≤ ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng

// Meta: { authRequired: false, role: 'tourist' }      

// Quy tr√¨nh c·∫ßn x√°c th·ª±c, th·ª±c ch·∫•t l√† m·ªôt middleware

        const { next, ctx } = opts;

            throw new TRPCError({ code: 'UNAUTHORIZED' }); // 401        
        }        
        return next({            
            // Nh√¨n v√†o c√°ch m√† m·∫´u d·ª± √°n create-d3-app vi·∫øt            
            // Th·ª±c s·ª± kh√¥ng c·∫ßn thi·∫øt, v√¨ ƒë√£ c√≥ trong ctx, kh√¥ng c·∫ßn m·ªü r·ªông n·ªØa            
            // ctx: {                
            //     session: { ...ctx.session }            
            // }        
        });    
    })    
    .meta({        
        authRequired: true,        
        role: 'user',    
    });   

// K·∫øt h·ª£p Meta M·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh: { authRequired: true, role: 'user' }      

// D√†nh ri√™ng cho ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng admin

        const { meta, next, ctx } = opts;

            throw new TRPCError({ code: 'FORBIDDEN' }); // 403        
        }        
        return next();    
    })    
    .meta({        
        role: 'admin',    
    });   
    // K·∫øt h·ª£p Meta M·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh: { authRequired: true, role: 'admin' }      

// G·ªçi n·ªôi b·ªô t·ª´ Server   
// export const createCaller = t.createCaller;

    // ·ªû ƒë√¢y s·ª≠ d·ª•ng adminProcedure, ch·ªâ admin m·ªõi c√≥ th·ªÉ t·∫°o ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng

        .input(val => val)    
        .mutation(async opt => {        
            console.log(opt.input, opt.ctx.session, (opt as any).meta);        
            // { id: 5, name: 'tmd', age: 100, role: 'user' }        
            // { user: { id: 1, name: 'xfz', role: 'admin' } }        
            // { authRequired: true, role: 'admin' }        

            try {            
                // Ch√®n d·ªØ li·ªáu v√†o c∆° s·ªü d·ªØ li·ªáu            
                return {                
                    status: 200,                
                    data: null,                
                    message: 'Created Success',            
                };        
            } catch (e: any) {            
                console.error(e.message);            
                throw new TRPCError({                
                    code: 'INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR',                
                    message: e.message,            
                });        
            }    
        }),    

    updateUser: authedProcedure    
        .input(val => val)    
        .mutation(async opt => {        
            console.log(opt.input);    
        }),   
});
product.ts

4. T·∫°o trpcClient

    links: [        
        // Thi·∫øt l·∫≠p ƒë·ªãa ch·ªâ duy nh·∫•t cho y√™u c·∫ßu trpc, t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng v·ªõi api router

ƒêo·∫°n m√£ utils.ts

// app/lib/utils.ts   
export const getBaseUrl = () => {    
    if (typeof window !== 'undefined')        
        // Tr√¨nh duy·ªát n√™n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n t∆∞∆°ng ƒë·ªëi        
        return '';    
    if (process.env.VERCEL_URL)        
        // Tham chi·∫øu cho vercel.com        
        return `https://${process.env.VERCEL_URL}`;    
    if (process.env.RENDER_INTERNAL_HOSTNAME)        
        // Tham chi·∫øu cho render.com        
        return `http://${process.env.RENDER_INTERNAL_HOSTNAME}:${process.env.PORT}`;    
    // Gi·∫£ ƒë·ªãnh localhost        
    return `http://localhost:${process.env.PORT ?? 3000}`;  
};

5. T√≠ch h·ª£p trpcRouter v√†o API route c·ªßa Next.js

  • ƒê∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n /api/trpc t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng v·ªõi httpBatchLink ƒë√£ thi·∫øt l·∫≠p cho trpcClient.

  • V√≠ d·ª•: khi g·ªçi trpcClient.User.getUserList.query(), y√™u c·∫ßu s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c g·ª≠i t·ªõi:

function handler(req: NextRequest) {    
    return fetchRequestHandler({        
        // ƒê·ªãa ch·ªâ ƒëi·ªÉm y√™u c·∫ßu, t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng v·ªõi th∆∞ m·ª•c app/api/trpc

        router: trpcRouter,

    });  
}  

export { handler as GET, handler as POST };

6.1 G·ªçi trpc t·ª´ Client Component

// app/(pages)/page.tsx

            role: 'user'        
        });    
    };

        </section>    
    );  
}

6.2 Ki·ªÉm tra d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·∫ßu v√†o

7.2 G·ªçi t·ª´ ph√≠a Server

7.4 C√°ch ti√™m session v√†o trpcCaller

Trong ph·∫ßn 7.2, c√°ch ch√∫ng ta ti√™m session v√†o trpcCaller g·∫∑p v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ v√† kh√¥ng th·ªÉ l·∫•y ƒë∆∞·ª£c session th·ª±c. D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† c√°ch c·∫£i ti·∫øn cho file trpcCaller.

    if (trpcCaller) {

    // L·∫•y session    
    // const session = await getServerSession();

            id: 1,            
            name: 'xfz',            
            role: 'admin',        
        },

        throw new Error('Unauthorized');

import { getTrpcCaller } from '@/app/_trpc/trpcCaller';

M·∫∑c d√π ƒëo·∫°n m√£ tr√™n th√†nh c√¥ng trong vi·ªác ti√™m session v√†o trpcCaller, nh∆∞ng n√≥ c√≥ m·ªôt s·ªë l·ªói nghi√™m tr·ªçng nh∆∞ sau:

  • Session c√≥ th·ªÉ h·∫øt h·∫°n: Session th∆∞·ªùng l√† t·∫°m th·ªùi, vi·ªác l∆∞u m·ªôt ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng session c√≥ th·ªÉ d·∫´n ƒë·∫øn vi·ªác ti·∫øp t·ª•c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng session ƒë√£ h·∫øt h·∫°n.

  • M√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng ƒëa ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng: N·∫øu ·ª©ng d·ª•ng c·ªßa b·∫°n ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông trong m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng nhi·ªÅu ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng, vi·ªác l∆∞u m·ªôt ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng session c√≥ th·ªÉ g√¢y ra v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ b·∫£o m·∫≠t, v√¨ c√°c y√™u c·∫ßu t·ª´ ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng kh√°c nhau c√≥ th·ªÉ chia s·∫ª c√πng m·ªôt session.

V√¨ v·∫≠y, t·ªët h∆°n h·∫øt l√† m·ªói khi g·ªçi getTrpcCaller, ch√∫ng ta n√™n l·∫•y l·∫°i session.

ƒê·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o t√≠nh b·∫£o m·∫≠t v√† duy nh·∫•t, t·ªët nh·∫•t n√™n l∆∞u tr·ªØ session tr·ª±c ti·∫øp trong c∆° s·ªü d·ªØ li·ªáu, t·∫°o m·ªôt b·∫£ng chuy√™n d·ª•ng cho qu·∫£n l√Ω session. N·∫øu c·∫£m th·∫•y phi·ªÅn ph·ª©c, c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m m·ªôt tr∆∞·ªùng session v√†o b·∫£ng ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng.

8. tRPC Middleware

  • tRPC middleware ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·ª±c hi·ªán th√¥ng qua procedure.use(middleware).
  • L∆∞u √Ω: Middleware cu·ªëi c√πng ph·∫£i lu√¥n return opts.next(), n·∫øu kh√¥ng, c√°c thao t√°c ph√≠a sau s·∫Ω kh√¥ng th·ªÉ th·ª±c hi·ªán.
  • use() ch·ªâ c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng tr∆∞·ªõc c√°c query ho·∫∑c mutation.
  • procedure.use(middleware) => newProcedure
Pre-Middleware

„ÄåX·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªõc, sau ƒë√≥ th·ª±c hi·ªán next()„Äç

import { publicProcedure, router } from '@/app/lib/trpc';

export const appRouter = router({
    test: publicProcedure
        .use(opts => {
            // opts: { ctx: { session ...}, next }
            console.log('--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªõc');
            // L∆∞u √Ω: Middleware cu·ªëi c√πng ph·∫£i return opts.next()
            return opts.next();
        })
        .query(async opts => {
            console.log('query...');
            return 'test';
        }),
});

K·∫øt qu·∫£ xu·∫•t ra:

--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªõc
query...

D·ª±a v√†o ƒë·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm n√†y, c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª±c hi·ªán x√°c th·ª±c danh t√≠nh trong middleware tr∆∞·ªõc.

    .use(opts => {
        if (!opts.ctx.session?.user) {
            throw new TRPCError({ code: 'FORBIDDEN' });
        }
        return opts.next();
    })
    .query(opts => {});
Post-Middleware

„ÄåTh·ª±c hi·ªán next() tr∆∞·ªõc, sau ƒë√≥ x·ª≠ l√Ω„Äç

    test: publicProcedure
        .use(opts => {
            const result = await opts.next();
            console.log('--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω sau');
            return result;
        })
        .use(opts => {
            console.log('--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªõc');
            return opts.next();
        })
        .query(async opts => {
            console.log('query...');
            return 'test';
        }),
});

K·∫øt qu·∫£ xu·∫•t ra:

--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªõc
query...
--- Middleware --- X·ª≠ l√Ω sau
M·ªü r·ªông ctx
export const appRouter = router({
    test: publicProcedure
        .use(opts => {
            console.log('1', opts.ctx);
            return opts.next({
                // N·∫øu ctx tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥ kh√¥ng c√≥ test, n√≥ s·∫Ω th√™m test, v√† ch·ª©a t·∫•t c·∫£ th√¥ng tin t·ª´ ctx tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥
                // N·∫øu ctx tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥ c√≥ test, n√≥ s·∫Ω ghi ƒë√® test
                ctx: { test: 123 } // Th√¥ng tin ctx tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥ s·∫Ω kh√¥ng b·ªã m·∫•t, ·ªü ƒë√¢y t∆∞∆°ng ƒë∆∞∆°ng v·ªõi vi·ªác merge
            });
        })
        .query(async opts => {
            console.log('2', opts.ctx);
            return 'test';
        }),
});

K·∫øt qu·∫£ xu·∫•t ra:

1, { session: { user: { id: 1, name: 'xfz', role: 'admin' } } }
2, { session: { user: { id: 1, name: 'xfz', role: 'admin' } }, test: 123 }
T√°ch Middleware

Trong ph√°t tri·ªÉn th·ª±c t·∫ø, c√≥ th·ªÉ t√°ch c√°c h√†m callback trong use ra ngo√†i ƒë·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng b·∫£o tr√¨ m√£:

const mid1 = middleware(async opts => {
    console.log('--- T√°ch middleware 1 ---');
    return opts.next();
});

const mid2 = middleware(async opts => {
    console.log('--- T√°ch middleware 2 ---');
    return opts.next();
});

export const appRouter = router({
    test: publicProcedure
        .use(mid1)
        .use(mid2)
        .query(opts => {}),
});
K·∫øt h·ª£p Middleware

C√°c middleware tr√™n c√≥ th·ªÉ k·∫øt h·ª£p l·∫°i v√† g√°n cho procedure:
